title: A new Sword?
body:
So when Angel Blade Riven _(or any Riven skin)_ comes out.

Does she get a new sword added in her Arcade Recall?
I know that seems like something that wouldnt happen, having to go back and change an existing skin every time a new one comes out.

But it'd feel kinda stink to play the Arcade Riven and know that it isn't all her swords in the recall _(which is the whole point!)_. especially as newer skins will likely have better and cooler swords than other older skins

Just asking :P

replies.body: That would be a dream for me as a Riven main haha :P
